thread.title: Golden Globes Review: Celebrities Save the Ceremony as Jimmy Fallon Flops, But the Broadcast Missed the Best Bits
thread.title_full: Golden Globes Review: Celebrities Save the Ceremony as Jimmy Fallon Flops, But the Broadcast Missed the Best Bits

author: Ben Travers
title: Golden Globes Review: Celebrities Save the Ceremony as Jimmy Fallon Flops, But the Broadcast Missed the Best Bits
text: The 2017 Golden Globes ceremony proved the necessity of celebrities and social media in enjoying an awards show without a strong host.
